Name: Roffignac
Instructions: SHAKE first 2 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: This bright red, fruity drink is simple but tasty.
History: This classic cocktail is named after Count Louis Philippe Joseph de Roffignac, Mayor of New Orleans 1820-1828. Roffignac notably introduced streetlights to New Orleans and instigated the laying cobblestones on the roads of the French Quarter.
